description:
Three arson cases occur at children`s playgrounds. Conan and his friends conduct a stake out at the lunch vendor used by the man they saw running from the crime scene. Last year, four fires were started at children`s playgrounds, but the suspect was never arrested. Kamaishi, the man they saw the previous night, appears at the lunch vendor, and Conan and his friends follow him. Later, a fire is started at the same playground where the previous year`s fourth fire occurred. Apparently Kamaishi was also watching the area to catch the arsonist. The next morning, the Detective Boys and Kamaishi go to investigate the fires together. Conan visits the various crime scenes and notices a certain rule...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une prévention du feu semée d`embûches
